entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High plus 4.

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High 13.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 in the morning then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 13. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 7:55 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
